name: PuzzleBreaker
description:
You got a new Job at Company Name Redacted.
They hired you as a Pre-Tester for their Puzzle Test Initiative.
Your Job is to break the Puzzles so they can fix the Problems before Start.

LemonJuicer is a Team by JPlexer and SalatSaft
PuzzleBreaker is a Game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0.
It is made in the Godot Game Engine
When Breaking/Failing the Level you don't lose your Job so Failure is Progress
Assets used are:
Ninja Adventure by Pixel-Boy
Dungeon Package by kvsr
1bit-controller by retryeli
Custom Assets by SalatSaft

Music Credits:
